verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The Lord Bless You And Keep You
The Lord Make His Face To Shine On You
And Be Gracious On To You
God Be Gracious On To You

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The Lord Lift His Contenance Up On You
And Give You Peace
And Give You Peace
The Lord Lift His Contenance Up On You
And Give You Peace
Amen… Amen… Amen… Amen…

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
The Lord Lift His Contenance Up On You
And Give You Peace
